EmailTemplate.name: Maintenance email
EmailTemplate.subject: Maintenance of single sign-on to SalesForce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear all, Please be informed that this Friday 2018-12-28, 09:00 AM - 11:00 AM CET Time we will update certificate used for single sign-on to SalesForce.
During this update in order to log in to SalesForce, you will need to use Username and Password. Please use "Forgot Your Password" button if you don't remember it.
If any questions, please contact us at Team.Salesforce@adform.com
Thanks SalesForce Team at Adform
